## Introduction
This is a demo document to create a map of counts of cvoid patients in Italy, using leaflet.


```{r }
library("leaflet")
```

### Getting the data

For this demo I'll be using this [github][1] repository.

```{r }
if (!(dir.exists("./data"))) {
    # download.file("https://codeload.github.com/pcm-dpc/COVID-19/zip/refs/heads/master", destfile = "COVID-19.zip")
    # unzip("COVID-19.zip")

    dir.create("./data/")

    download.file("https://github.com/pcm-dpc/COVID-19/blob/master/dati-regioni/dpc-covid19-ita-regioni.csv", destfile = "./data/latest.csv")
}
```





[1]: https://github.com/pcm-dpc/COVID-19 "Health Ministery"
